title: Mascot Design & Animation for SyncAI Network
description: Mascot character development and static & animated stickers for Discord

content.value: SyncAI is a one-click super dApp in the Cardano ecosystem that unifies your Web3 experience. It connects blockchains, dApps, and users behind the scenes, so everything works together seamlessly. It solves a key Web3 challenge: the lack of a unified communication layer.

Create a cute and simple koala character that represents SyncAI. The mascot should feature the logo as a visible stamp or element in each pose. It must embody relatable crypto/degen culture: expressive, fun, and community-driven. The character will appear in various poses and moods to help users feel connected and part of the SyncAI community.

content.caption: Initial set of exploratory poses in the brand colors
Got some really positive feedback right out the gate and the client requested for some minor tweaks regarding the ears, elements and color

content.value: I got rid of any unnecessary elements and fluff to simplify it further. Gave the little fella some cute, rounded ears to match the rest of the aesthetic.
Played into the koala's natural poses. Incorporated some crypto references and great, subtle usage of the logo.
Animated Stickers for the Telegram & Discord community
